Name: Helegrod: Drake Wing
Note: In this wing of Helegrod, Drakes and Drakelings have built their nests.

Name: Helegrod: Spider Wing
Note: In this wing of Helegrod, giant spiders are gathering.

Name: Helegrod: Giant Wing
Note: In this wing of Helegrod, Stone-giants swear fealty to the Thunder-lord.

Name: Helegrod: Dragon Wing
Note: At the central courtyard of Helegrod, a fell ritual is taking place...

Name: The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu
Note: In the far east of Angmar, an ancient evil of the First Age has been uncovered...

Name: Bogbereth
Note: Beneath Himbar, the spider queen Bogbereth gains power.

Name: Ferndúr the Virulent
Note: In Imlad Balchorth, the Gaunt-lord Ferndúr raises the Dead for his dark plans.

Name: The Vile Maw
Note: In the deepest waters of Moria, an ancient terror looms...

Name: Filikul
Note: Nornúan, a beast of enormous size, has been discovered in the Water-works.

Name: Dâr Narbugud
Note: Beneath the foundations of Moria, nameless creatures stir as an unspeakable plague threatens to spread througout the Mines.

Name: Barad Guldur
Note: The tower of the Lieutenant of Dol Guldur is under attack!

Name: Ost Dunhoth
Note: In the hills of Enedwaith, the Gaunt-lord Gortheron rallies his forces in secret.

Name: Draigoch's Lair
Note: In a cave west of the Misty Mountains, one of the last great Dragons slumbers.

Name: Tower of Orthanc
Note: Saruman holds command over Isengard and has forged his very own Rings of Power.

Name: Flight to the Lonely Mountain
Note: The army of Rhûn has conquered Dale and pursues its inhabitants towards Erebor.

Name: The Fires of Smaug
Note: As the Easterlings lay siege to Erebor, the dwarves struggle to defend their home.

Name: The Battle for Erebor
Note: The final assault on Erebor is at hand and the commanders of the besieging army step forward to fight.

Name: The Deeping Wall
Note: The host of Isengard besieges Helm's Deep, the strongest fortress of Rohan.

Name: Throne of the Dread Terror
Note: As the Battle of Pelennor Fields rages, a new commander arises after the fall of the Witch-king.
